reviewText:
Documentary of how the Nissan Z car put Nissan on the road to being a major car manufacture.

It was the right car at just the right time to catch the American market for an economical two seat sports coupe.

I was one of those caught up in Z-car fever and eventually I now own three of them along with the classic British X-KE or e-type as it is properly called.  The e-type provided some inspiration for the Z car as did the Ferrari 250..
